column2: Role:  Associate Faculty- English and Soft Skills  Location : Tech Mahindra SMART Academy for Logistics, Hyderabad Experience : 3-5 years of work experience as English and Soft Skills Trainer. Qualification : Any Degree (Preferably MA English or BA English). Number of openings : 1 Roles and Responsibilities: Create lesson plans/curriculum for English / Communication Training for the students. Facilitates day-to-day classes to assist students in learning English knowledge and communication skills. Constantly monitors and updates the quality of training and curriculum from time to time. Track student progress and give them feedback. Create and conduct assessments and extra classes for weaker students. Create and maintain a positive and professional learning environment. Utilize a variety of the training methodologies, techniques, concepts, learning tools, and practices to ensure maximum effectiveness of training programs. Any other task as assigned by the management. Desired Skill Sets: Excellent written and verbal communication skills. Excellent command on English language.  Understanding of effective teaching methodologies and tools.  Willing to learn and adopt new skills. Flexible in handling multiple tasks. Excellent presentation, Feedback and coaching skills. Good computer knowledge. Should be able to communicate in Telugu-regional language.

column2: Elite Overseas Education Consultant is looking for IELTS Faculty to join our dynamic team and embark on a rewarding career journey      As an IELTS Faculty member, you will play a pivotal role in preparing students for the International English Language Testing System (IELTS) examination      Your responsibilities will include delivering engaging and effective lessons, designing course materials, assessing student progress, and providing constructive feedback to help students achieve their desired band scores        Key Responsibilities:        Teaching IELTS Preparation Courses: Design and deliver high-quality IELTS preparation courses to students with varying proficiency levels      Curriculum Development: Develop and update course materials, including lesson plans, worksheets, and practice tests, to ensure alignment with the latest IELTS exam requirements and standards      Student Assessment: Conduct regular assessments to evaluate students' language skills and track their progress towards their target band scores      Individualized Feedback: Provide personalized feedback to students on their strengths, weaknesses, and areas for improvement, and offer strategies to enhance their performance in each skill area (Listening, Reading, Writing, and Speaking)      Classroom Management: Create a positive and supportive learning environment that encourages active participation and collaboration among students      Stay Updated: Stay informed about changes in the IELTS exam format, scoring criteria, and best practices in language teaching and assessment      Student Support: Offer guidance and support to students outside of class hours, including answering questions, providing additional resources, and addressing concerns related to the exam      Professional Development: Engage in ongoing professional development activities, such as attending workshops, conferences, and training sessions, to enhance your teaching skills and stay abreast of developments in the field of English language teaching and assessment
column11: language teaching, soft skills, english literature, overseas education, teaching, training, english language, english language training, counselling, curriculum development, examination, leadership skills, ielts, communication skills, personality development

Role & responsibilities Master's Degree or MA in ESL; PhD preferred. Develop comprehensive curriculums for English Language courses offered university-wide. Tailor curriculums to meet the diverse linguistic needs and proficiency levels of students. Create and curate a variety of resource material like online materials and supplementary resources for ESL courses. Ensure resources align with curriculum objectives and cater to various learning styles and abilities. Employing dynamic and engaging teaching strategies to foster language acquisition and proficiency. Implement formative and summative assessment techniques to evaluate student progress and proficiency levels. Provide constructive feedback and support to students to enhance their language skills. Design and administer screening and diagnostic tests to assess students' language proficiency levels. Collaborate with faculty, administrators, and stakeholders to align ESL programs with institutional goals and standards. Participate in professional development activities, including conferences, workshops and research projects related to ESL education. Serve as a resource and mentor to colleagues, sharing expertise and fostering a collaborative learning environment.

column2: Global Colliance is looking for IELTS Faculty to join our dynamic team and embark on a rewarding career journey      We are seeking a qualified and experienced IELTS Faculty member to join our team      The IELTS Faculty will be responsible for delivering high-quality IELTS preparation courses, providing guidance to students, and ensuring that they are well-prepared for the IELTS examination      The ideal candidate should have a strong command of the English language, expertise in IELTS test strategies, and a passion for helping students achieve their language proficiency goals        Key Responsibilities:        IELTS Instruction:Conduct IELTS preparation classes for students, focusing on all four language skills: Listening, Reading, Writing, and Speaking      Develop and deliver engaging and effective lessons that align with IELTS test requirements      Test Strategies and Techniques:Instruct students on effective strategies and techniques to excel in each section of the IELTS exam      Provide practical tips for time management and improving overall test performance      Individualized Coaching:Offer personalized coaching to address the specific needs and challenges of individual students      Conduct mock tests and assessments to evaluate students' progress      Feedback and Evaluation:Provide constructive feedback on students' performance in practice tests and assignments      Evaluate and track students' progress, identifying areas for improvement      Resource Development:Develop and update course materials, including practice tests, exercises, and study guides      Stay informed about changes in the IELTS test format and incorporate relevant updates into the curriculum      Student Support:Offer guidance and support to students regarding the IELTS registration process, exam policies, and related inquiries      Motivate and inspire students to achieve their language proficiency goals      Collaboration:Collaborate with other faculty members and academic staff to enhance the overall quality of the IELTS program      Attend faculty meetings and training sessions as required
